item.description: 硬件信息 类型 型号 数量 规格 CPU Intel Xeon Gold 6254 @ 3.10GHz 2 Memory Samsung RDIMM ECC DDR4 2933MHz 288Pin with 32GB capacity 4 Motherboard Supermicro X11DPG-QT 1 GPU Nvidia RTX 2080 Ti 4 SSD Intel D3 S4610 Series 960GB 2.5" NAND TLC SATA III SSD 1 HDD Western Digital Ultrastar DC HC320 8TB 3.5-inch Data Center Hard Drive 1 Power 1 2000W Network Adapter Intel Ethernet Controller
